name: MAP2K2
description: Also known as MP2K2_HUMAN, MAP2K2, MEK2, MKK2, PRKMK2. Catalyzes the concomitant phosphorylation of a threonine and a tyrosine residue in a Thr-Glu-Tyr sequence located in MAP kinases. Activates the ERK1 and ERK2 MAP kinases. Interacts with MORG1 (By similarity). Interacts with SGK1 (PubMed:19447520). Interacts with KSR1 (PubMed:10409742).
full_name: Dual specificity mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase 2
